Desc.entry: A lively growing multi-cultural church which started in 2000 with a vision to serve the needs of Burngreave, Pitsmoor and North East Sheffield through preaching the gospel and offering practical help in the community. Open to all. Offers creche facilities and children's activities at the Sunday Service. Runs a youth programme. Has meetings during the week for prayer, worship and bible study held in local homes. Holds a weekly prayer evening an Fridays. Please email your requests for prayer.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sunday Service at 10.30am, contact for details of mid-week activites
